projects.name: Barflow
projects.description: A full-stack bar and restaurant management system that streamlines operations from QR-based customer ordering to payment processing. It provides real-time order tracking, inventory and table management, and role-based tools for admins, bar staff, and waiters.

projects.name: PeluditosYa
projects.description: Web platform that connects Bolivian animal shelters with responsible adopters and donors. Provides registration for adopters and shelters, pet profile management with medical history, adoption request workflows, QR-based donations, responsive UI, and email notifications to support transparent, responsible pet adoption.

projects.name: Automated Attedance System
projects.description: Face recognition–based attendance system with CLI and GUI for capturing face data, extracting HOG features, training a neural network, and performing real‑time recognition to track course-specific attendance, manage students and schedules, and export detailed attendance records.
